p: Figure 2 displays a visualization map of international research collaboration of countries that have published at least 10 articles on ML in the context of (2010–2023). Accordingly, 67 countries are located in five clusters. The largest cluster (red) included 19 countries centered in Italy. Seventeen countries from Europe, one from Africa, and one from Ocean were shown in Figure 2, which established scientific communication with each other. The next cluster (green) had eighteen countries centered on India. Fourteen countries from Asia, with Egypt and Ethiopia from Africa and Russia from Europe, had scientific relations with each other. The third cluster, with ten countries centered on the USA along with China, Australia, and South Korea, is marked with blue color. Countries on the map's periphery, such as Jordan, Luxemburg, and North Irland, had less international cooperation than those in the center of the map.
